section: Impact of Tropical Depression Imelda on Southeast Texas

questions.question: What areas of Southeast Texas were most affected by Tropical Depression Imelda?
How does the flooding from Imelda compare to previous incidents like Hurricane Harvey?
What improvements have been made to infrastructure since Hurricane Harvey?
Are there any political agreements on what needs to be done to address flooding issues?

section: Public Perception and Climate Change Discussions

questions.question: How are residents of Southeast Texas responding to the link between climate change and severe storms?
Is there a sense of urgency among locals to take action against flooding and climate change?

section: Emotional and Social Impact on Residents

questions.question: What are some ways in which repeated flooding has affected the emotional well-being of residents?
In what ways has community support played a role in recovery after disasters like Imelda?
